Add Group Coverages to ArchR Project

addGroupCoverages.Rd

This function will merge cells within each group into an insertion coverage file

addGroupCoverages(ArchRProj, groupBy = "Clusters", useLabels = TRUE,
  minCells = 40, maxCells = 500, maxFragments = 25 * 10^6,
  minReplicates = 2, maxReplicates = 5, sampleRatio = 0.8,
  kmerLength = 6, threads = 16, parallelParam = "mclapply",
  force = FALSE, verboseHeader = TRUE, verboseAll = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

ArchRProj

ArchRProject
groupBy

group cells by this column in cellColData
useLabels

use sample labels to create sample guided subgroupings as pseudo replicates
minCells

minimum cells per group for coverage files
maxCells

maximum cells per group for coverage files
maxFragments

maximum fragments per group for coverage files (this prevents large files created for optimizing memory)
minReplicates

minimum replicates for group for coverage files
maxReplicates

maximum replicates for group for coverage files
sampleRatio

sampling ratio for pseudo replicates when needed
kmerLength

kmer length for adding Tn5 bias estimation
threads

number of threads
parallelParam

parallel parameters for batch style execution
force

force creating coverage files if existed
verboseHeader

verbose sections
verboseAll

verbose sections and subsections
...

additional args

Contents

  • Arguments
